document_data.name: The Dancing Coin
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dancing Coin''' was a moneychanging house located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The house was located in south Zhentil Keep in the eastern section of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] on [[Zhent Avenue]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The Dancing Coin was owned by a man named [[Andalias]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}.
document_data.Defenses: Since upwards of 75,000 [[gp]] worth of currency was kept in the Dancing Coin at any given time, Andalias took security seriously. He had a [[wizard]] create a pair of [[clay golem]]s that were under his control thanks to an enchanted ring he wore at all times. [[Zhentilar]] patrols made it a point to stay close to the Dancing Coin as well, perhaps because of well-placed bribes.
